discounted_ylds:
Sum of YLDs from each infected group (not including healthy infants) - sum these up and then apply a discounting as with YLLs

## HIV infected infants
(hiv_infected_infants) * (inf_ART_coverage*avg_ART_adherence*dw_HIVtx) + 
  (hiv_infected_infants) * (1-inf_ART_coverage*avg_ART_adherence) * (dw_HIVnotx*propLE_HIV_notx+dwAIDSnotx*(1-propLE_HIV_notx) +

## syphilis infected infants - only for those under 4 years old
ifelse(age < 4, syphilis_infected_infants * dw_syp, 0)

## coinfected infants
coinfected_infants * (inf_ART_coverage*avg_ART_adherence*ifelse(age<4, dw_syp+HIVtx, dw_HIVtx) +
  (1-inf_ART_coverage*avg_ART_adherence) * ifelse(age<4, dw_syp+HIVnotx, dw_HIVnotx)*propLE_HIV_notx) +
  ifelse(age<4, dw_syp+AIDSnotx, dw_AIDSnotx)*(1-propLE_HIV_notx) +

## Low birthweight infants - only for those 1 and younger
ifelse(age <2, lbw_infants*dw_lbw, 0)
